message.headline: 🛠️ You're using Read File + JSON Manager
message.nudge: You’ve already processed multiple files and structured entries — but you're still copying data manually.
message.recommendation: 🚀 Unlock Outline Editor to instantly generate linked, editable documents from your JSON entries.

bonus_combo.value_add: Generate illustrated content blocks directly from your structured notes.

message.referral_cta: You're 1 referral away from unlocking it. Want to activate it now?

message.headline: 🎨 You’ve built content — now visualize it
message.nudge: You're already drafting docs using Outline. Why stop at words?
message.recommendation: Unlock Ideogram to generate images directly from your content or metadata.

bonus_combo.value_add: Create illustrated blog posts directly from source files.

message.referral_cta: Just 1 more referral unlocks image generation.

message.headline: 🤖 You’re creating content and scheduling it
message.nudge: You’ve got a flow — now make it automatic.
message.recommendation: Unlock Composer to automate chained tasks like blog→tweet→publish.

bonus_combo.value_add: Auto-assemble and dispatch longform + social queues in one click.

message.referral_cta: Composer is 1 unlock away. Ready to automate?

message.headline: 💻 You’re orchestrating logic — now go lower
message.nudge: You’ve reached the automation layer. Why not edit the tools themselves?
message.recommendation: Unlock Code Editor to modify, extend, and patch your own tools live.

bonus_combo.value_add: Deploy, debug, and hot-patch tools directly in the runtime.

message.referral_cta: The toolbuilder tier is right here — 1 referral left.

message.headline: 🌐 You’re working across tools
message.nudge: Ready to call any API, trigger any webhook, and connect anything to anything?
message.recommendation: Unlock Universal Integrator to turn Orchestrate into your personal API gateway.

bonus_combo.value_add: Pipe knowledge into memory, trigger workflows externally, and ingest from anywhere.

message.referral_cta: This is the final unlock. You’re 1 referral from root access.

message.headline: 📚 You’re managing data — want to feed it smarter?
message.nudge: You’ve created structured entries. Now enrich them with synced highlights.
message.recommendation: Unlock Readwise Tool to import highlights from your reading list.

bonus_combo.value_add: Auto-store key passages as Mems linked to your JSON stack.

message.referral_cta: You’re 1 referral from pulling your reading into Orchestrate.

message.headline: 🧠 Capture what matters — permanently
message.nudge: You’ve structured and stored data. But what about raw insights?
message.recommendation: Unlock Mem Tool to create searchable, personal memory objects.

bonus_combo.value_add: Store synced quotes as internal reflections automatically.

message.referral_cta: 1 referral unlocks your personal memory engine.

message.headline: 📅 You've written content — now schedule it
message.nudge: You’re generating posts manually. What if they published themselves?
message.recommendation: Unlock Buffer Engine to schedule and publish content across platforms.

bonus_combo.value_add: Automate your entire content pipeline from write → queue → publish.

message.headline: 📝 You’ve got pieces — want the full post?
message.nudge: You’ve got exports, drafts, and markdown. But no unified article.
message.recommendation: Unlock Blog Assembler to stitch structured content into a full publishable blog.

bonus_combo.value_add: Illustrate and schedule your article instantly after assembly.

message.headline: 📁 You’re writing tools — want to ship them?
message.nudge: You’ve edited code. Now it’s time to version, push, and track it.
message.recommendation: Unlock GitHub Universal to sync any Orchestrate project to a real repo.

bonus_combo.value_add: Chain commits, generate readmes, and version logic with Composer.

message.headline: 🖥️ You’re editing logic — now run it at shell level
message.nudge: You’ve touched the tools. Ready to launch them like a real dev?
message.recommendation: Unlock Terminal to run, debug, and execute anything from within Orchestrate.

bonus_combo.value_add: Trigger shell-level commands as part of any API logic chain.

message.referral_cta: Power tools await — just 1 referral needed.
